argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | oppgtmd.1 | |- O = ( oppG ` G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_tgpgrp | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> G e. Grp ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_oppggrp | |- ( G e. Grp -> O e. Grp ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> O e. Grp ) |
| 5 |  | #P_tgptmd | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> G e. TopMnd ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_oppgtmd | |- ( G e. TopMnd -> O e. TopMnd ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> O e. TopMnd ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` G ) = ( invg ` G ) |
| 9 | 1, 8 | #P_oppginv | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( invg ` G ) = ( invg ` O ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> ( invg ` G ) = ( invg ` O ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopOpen ` G ) = ( TopOpen ` G ) |
| 12 | 11, 8 | #P_tgpinv | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> ( invg ` G ) e. ( ( TopOpen ` G ) Cn ( TopOpen ` G ) ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> ( invg ` O ) e. ( ( TopOpen ` G ) Cn ( TopOpen ` G ) ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 11 | #P_oppgtopn | |- ( TopOpen ` G ) = ( TopOpen ` O ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` O ) = ( invg ` O ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_istgp | |- ( O e. TopGrp <-> ( O e. Grp /\ O e. TopMnd /\ ( invg ` O ) e. ( ( TopOpen ` G ) Cn ( TopOpen ` G ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 4, 7, 13, 16 | #P_syl3anbrc | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> O e. TopGrp ) |
